content.raw: Presently since BLACS isn't using `max_instructions` I don't think it really needs to be stored anywhere, strictly speaking - and since changing the number doesn't require a recompilation of the connection table (even if you actually swapped out the PulseBlaster for one which was identical but had a different instruction limit, a recompile would still not be required), it certainly doesn't need to be in the connection table properties. So storing it in `device_properties` seems unnecessary, but harmless, so I see no problem there.

So storing it in device_properties seems unnecessary, but harmless, so I see no problem there.
